plugins.name: Button Genie Pro
plugins.description:
Welcome to Button Genie Pro, the Figma plugin that instantly generates a fully featured button component set with every variant, state and Token, so you can focus on design, not tedious setup.


https://geniepro.app/


Quick Start


1. Create a new page in your Figma file where you want to place your button component set.

2. Run the plugin: Search for Button Genie Pro.

3. Follow the two-step UI to create variables and generate buttons.



Create Variables Foundations


On the first screen of the plugin, a single click generates 5 variable collections to lay the foundation of your button system. This makes updating your buttons much more flexible:

00 Primitives

01 Style Tokens

02 Semantic Colors

03 Sizing Tokens

04 Component Tokens

05 Typography



Preview and Generate Button Set


1. Light and Dark Mode: See your Primary, Secondary, and Tertiary buttons side by side in Light and Dark Mode. When you choose your Light or Dark Base Color, Button Genie Pro will automatically define the reverted color. (You can always tweaks colors later in your Figma Variables section).

2. Real-time Contrast Check always make sure your text meets WCAG AA or AAA standards.

3. Customize:

- Button text

- Stroke width for secondary button

- Horizontal/vertical padding, gap, and border radius

- Toggle variants: hover, focus, selected, disabled

- Add icon-only or pill-shaped buttons

4. Create Button Set: Click to generate up to 360 variants (3 types Ã— 5 states Ã— 2 shapes Ã— 3 sizes Ã— 4 content variants), a set of semantic buttons (Success, Warning, Error), and a set of placeholder icons. The base color you choose will be added to your custom color scale (myColor/randomName/50â€“900) in the Primitives variable collection.



Use Your Button Component


- All generated buttons are grouped into component sets in your document.

- Drag instances onto any frame and override text or icon as needed.

- Variables keep your design tokens flexible: update a token to cascade changes through every button.



Troubleshooting


- If you don't see new components:

  1. Ensure you've correctly generated variables/tokens at the first screen, before generating your button set.
  2. This plugin needs a Figma paid subscription to create Variable Modes. Make sure your have one. If not, the plugin will not work as expected.

- For manual hex input issues, make sure to include a leading `#` and six hex digits.
plugins.tagline: Instantly generates fully featured button component sets with variants & variables (tokens).

plugins.name: Ai Design Review
plugins.description:
Transform Your Design Process with AI-powered Insights


Ai Design Review is a cutting-edge Figma plugin designed to help designers optimize their work by providing AI-driven design reviews. With this plugin, you can instantly analyze your designs and receive suggestions for improvement based on best practices in typography, layout, color schemes, accessibility, and overall visual consistency.


By utilizing AI technology, Ai Design Review helps you ensure that your designs adhere to industry standards, making your workflow more efficient and your designs more polished. The plugin automatically scans your design file, analyzes it against key design principles, and highlights potential issues, offering actionable insights and suggestions to improve the design's quality and user experience.


Whether you're a solo designer or part of a design team, Ai Design Review will serve as your AI assistant, providing real-time feedback to enhance your designâ€™s impact and usability.


Key Features:

Automated Design Analysis: Instantly scan your designs for inconsistencies, color imbalances, accessibility issues, and more.


AI-Driven Recommendations: Receive intelligent suggestions for design improvements tailored to your project.


Customizable Feedback: Choose the types of design elements you want to receive feedback on, such as typography, spacing, or color.


Efficient Workflow: Save time and enhance collaboration by automatically detecting and fixing common design mistakes.


Boost your design efficiency and improve your work with Ai Design Review â€” your AI-powered design assistant.
plugins.tagline: Enhance your designs with AI-powered insights for better quality and consistency

plugins.name: Sudoku Frame
plugins.description:
Boost your design workflow with Sudoku Frame, the ultimate Figma plugin for creating customizable Sudoku tables in seconds! Perfect for designers, prototypers, and puzzle enthusiasts, this plugin lets you generate Sudoku grids with 4 difficulty levelsâ€”Easy, Medium, Hard, and Expert.


Choose between Numbers or Letters to suit your projectâ€™s style. With the Show Outlines mode, reveal answers effortlessly while keeping them hidden in the default viewâ€”ideal for testing, prototyping, or adding interactive elements to your designs.


Whether you're mocking up educational tools, game interfaces, or creative layouts, Sudoku Frame streamlines the process with precision and flexibility. Download now and start designing smarter!

plugins.name: Conjure - AI based text generator
plugins.description:
Introduction


Use your OpenAI API key with this plugin to quickly generate text for your designs. The plugin can allows to generate multiple text layers based on the content. Furthermore, it can also group the layers by their names, allowing you to use the layer names in the prompt to further elaborate how you want the data to be filled in.


How to use


The plugin was primarily created for 2 use cases:


1. Generate variations of a single type of data:

  1. Select all the text layers that show the same type of data and you want to generate variations of it. Imagine Name, City, Stock price, etc.
  2. Make sure 'Group by layer name' is OFF.
  3. Add details to the prompt to explain the type of content you want to be generated for the selected fields. Giving examples and formatting is also helpful.
  4. Click generate and it will fill the information!



2. Generate variations of multiple types of data:

  1. Select all the frames or components that you want to fill using this plugin.
  2. Turn ON 'Group by layer name'. The plugin will show you the layer names found.
  3. Add details to the prompt to explain the type of content you want to be generated for the selected fields. You can use the layer names to add specific context. Giving examples and formatting is also helpful.
  4. Click generate and it will fill the information!


3. Generated related data

You can use the group by layer name to select singular text layers which are related. An example is when you need text for First name, Last name, DoB, role, location and relatives. The plugin will try to generate related content for these layers.


Note


1. This plugin needs an OpenAI API Key to work.

2. I will recommend naming your text layers appropriately if you plan to use the Group by layer name feature. You can use it without naming the layers, but sometimes this might result in unexpected results.
plugins.tagline: OpenAI powered text generator with batch text generation feature

plugins.description:
In the new version of "Corner Artist," I've added a language switch feature between Chinese and English. Here, you can freely switch to your preferred language as needed.


The new version optimizes the user experience, making the overall UI more refined and convenient.


By clicking the button, you can randomly switch to your favorite gradient colors.

Additionally, the new version introduces a "Random Corner Radius" feature, allowing you to choose the layer you want to modify and adjust the corner radius strength.


Here, the higher the value, the smaller the corner radius strength.


Iâ€™ve used the superellipse corner radius formula:

|x/a|^n + |y/b|^n = 1

When n = 2, itâ€™s a regular ellipse;

When n < 2, itâ€™s a superellipse;

The smaller the value of n, the closer the corners are to right angles.


For those interested, you can explore the formula on your own; Iâ€™ll post it in the comments.

When you choose a corner radius strength less than 1, you'll also receive stars as a bonus.


That's about it for the new features. Feel free to experience and save them!
plugins.tagline: Making the overall UI more refined and convenient.

plugins.name: Text Color Pairs To Variables
plugins.description:
Usage

  1. Create a frame with any name.
  2. Inside the frame created in step 1, create another frame named variableColorItem.
  3. Inside variableColorItem, create a frame named variableColor.
  4. Set a fill color for variableColor.
  5. Within variableColorItem, create a text layer named variableName.
  6. Select the frame you created in step 1.
  7. Launch the plugin.
  8. Click the button.
  9. The color of variableColor will be registered as a local variable under the name variableName.

plugins.name: Sliding Text
plugins.description:
Sliding Text transforms static text into engaging animated components with just a few clicks. This plugin allows designers to:


  1. Convert any text layer into a dynamic text slide component
  2. Customize animation direction (top-to-bottom, bottom-to-top, left-to-right, right-to-left)
  3. Fine-tune animation timing, stagger delay, and easing
  4. Preview animations directly in the plugin interface
  5. Create components that maintain the original text's font, size, and styling
  6. Generate a "done" state for the final animation frame


Simply select a text layer, enter your phrases or words separated by commas, choose your animation settings, and let the plugin generate a fully configured component with smart animate transitions. Perfect for creating engaging sliding text / rotating messages / dynamic text effects without any coding knowledge.
plugins.tagline: Smooth text slide animations with customizable directions and timing

plugins.name: Combine Pages
plugins.description:
A Figma plugin built for designers who value organization just as much as iteration.


Whether you're wrapping up a sprint, handing off files, or simply cleaning house, Archive & Combine Pages helps you bring order to your design file with ease. Select any number of pages, and this plugin will neatly group their content into a single new page titled Archive [date]. Each pageâ€™s content is preserved as a section, spaced evenly and grouped for clarity. Once processed, original pages are renamed with an ARCHIVED_ prefix â€” so nothing gets lost, but everything gets tidied.

plugins.name: flowwwww
plugins.description:
Streamline your workflows with flowwwww, the ultimate plugin for creating dynamic connectors between frames, components, and other objects in Figma. Whether you're designing user flows, wireframes, or complex diagrams, flowwwwwempowers you to create professional, customizable connections with ease.


Key Features

Intuitive Connector Creation

Select two frames or components, and flowwwww will instantly generate a connector between them.


Highly Customizable

Personalize your connectors with adjustable properties:

Stroke color and size.

Add text annotations to label your connectors for enhanced clarity.


Smart Obstacle Avoidance

Enable Obstacle Mode to automatically detect and avoid overlapping objects, ensuring clean and unobstructed connectors.

Perfect for complex designs where connectors need to navigate around other elements.



Use Cases

User Flows : Map out user journeys with clear, annotated connectors between screens.

Wireframing : Create structured layouts with precise connections between components.

Technical Diagrams : Build flowcharts, process maps, and other technical illustrations with ease.

Prototyping : Enhance your prototypes with interactive and visually appealing connectors.


How It Works

Install the flowwwww plugin from the Figma Community.

Select two frames, components, or rectangles that you want to connect.


Configure your connector settings (color, style, etc.) via the plugin interface.


Let flowwwww do the restâ€”watch as it creates beautiful, dynamic connectors that adapt to your design.


Why Choose flowwwww?

flowwwww is more than just a connector toolâ€”itâ€™s a productivity booster for designers who value precision, flexibility, and efficiency. With its robust feature set and seamless integration into Figma, flowwwww is the go-to solution for anyone looking to elevate their design workflow.


Feedback and Support

Weâ€™re committed to making flowwwww the best it can be! If you have any suggestions, encounter issues, or simply love the plugin, weâ€™d love to hear from you. Leave a comment on the Figma Community page or reach out to us directly.


Get Started Today

Install flowwwww now and experience the power of effortless connector creation. Simplify your design process and bring your ideas to life with clarity and precision.
plugins.tagline: Effortless Connector Creation for Figma

plugins.name: C2O - Clutter to Organised
plugins.description:
C2O (Clutter to Organized) is a simple and effective Figma plugin that helps designers automatically arrange frames into a structured layout. If your Figma file feels cluttered, C2O will neatly organize everything in just one click.


âœ¨ How It Works:

1ï¸âƒ£ Rename your frames with a prefix inside square brackets.

Example:

[1a] Login Page (Row 1, Frame A)

[1b] Password Entry (Row 1, Frame B)

[2a] Dashboard (Row 2, Frame A)

2ï¸âƒ£ Run the plugin and click "Organize Frames".

3ï¸âƒ£ Your frames will be arranged into clearly structured groups, placed in order from top to bottom.

Frames without the naming pattern will be placed in an "Others" group at the bottom.


ğŸ’¡ Why Use C2O?

Eliminates manual alignment work and saves time.

Keeps designs structured and easy to navigate.

Improves team collaboration by maintaining a clean layout.

plugins.name: Font Theme
plugins.description:
Not all fonts that go well together match the theme of your design. This AI powered plugin lets you describe your design and its intended audience and then suggests font pairs that match the theme you entered. You can also simply just type in the vibe or feeling you want the font to evoke.


The best part? You can save the fonts and all their weights as text styles in your Figma with the click of a button!


The text styles will save the font weights as numbers because that's how developers code font weights. This will ease the communication with your developers because you'll get familiar with how they refer to font weights.
plugins.tagline: Search for font pairs to match the feeling of your design.

plugins.description:
A specialized Figma plugin designed exclusively for Adtraction employees to streamline the process of converting complex Excel reports into presentation-ready Figma tables.


Key Features:

  2. ğŸ¯ Purpose-built for Adtraction's reporting structure:
  3. Koncern (Group) tables
  4. Moderbolag (Parent company) tables
  5. Other financial data tables
  6. ğŸ¨ Maintains Adtraction's brand typography with Lexend font
  7. ğŸ” Preview tables before generation
  8. âš¡ï¸ Bulk processing of multiple tables from a single Excel file
  9. ğŸ”’ Local processing for data security


Perfect Use Case:

Designed specifically for Adtraction's quarterly and annual financial reporting workflow. When you have one large Excel file containing multiple tables of financial data, this plugin automatically:

  1. Identifies different table sections
  2. Splits them into separate tables
  3. Applies appropriate styling based on table type (koncern/moderbolag)
  4. Generates all tables with consistent formatting


Ideal for:

  2. Corporate communications staff
